title: Hardwood-Inspired Flooring, Two-Toned Upgraded Paint, Ceiling Fans
posting_body: This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1030 Sq.
Experience quiet and distinctive apartment homes for rent situated within the Paradise Valley, minutes away from the world famous Las Vegas Strip.
Comfort and relaxation set the theme for The Quinn Apartments.
Our lush landscaping and unique architecture provide an atmosphere you won't find anywhere else.
Visit our photo gallery and call us to schedule a personal tour.
Open the door to a new way of life at The Quinn Apartments.

Newly Renovated Apartment Homes Available*, Patio/Balcony, Ceiling Fans, Fireplace*, Hardwood-Inspired Flooring*, Double Kitchen Sinks, Walk-In Closets, Stainless-Steel Appliances*, Two-Toned Upgraded Paint*, In-Kitchen Pantry, Central Air Conditioning & Heating, Full-Size Washer/Dryer
24-Hour Pool & Spa, Fitness Center, Free Wi-Fi in Common Areas, Community Clubhouse, 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance, Online Payments Available, Gated Entry
We are a pet friendly community.
Please see one of our leasing specialists for a list of pet deposit, pet fees and monthly pet rent information.
